text: The Alexander ALX100 was a body of a minibus, It had a step entrance. It was built by Alexander from 1997 to 1999. The ALX100 body was built on the Mercedes-Benz O814D Vario chassis and the O810D van chassis. The ALX100 was nearly the same as the bus body Plaxton Beaver 2, which was also bodied on the Mercedes-Benz Vario chassis. ==References== * * * * ==Other websites== * ALX100 Category:Minibuses
title: Alexander ALX100
